title: TYPOPHILE BIRTHDAYS
content:
You can add me to May. The 12th.

 [‹ Ambigrams and wordplay](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012181832/http:/www.typophile.com/node/1529 "Go to previous forum topic") [Type foundry for sale ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012181832/http:/www.typophile.com/node/1519 "Go to next forum topic")
author: terminaldesign

comments.content: September 24. Libra.

Happy birthday!   
   
BTW, Jared: Cisco, funny.   
   
hhp

Happy birthday Sean!   
   
Do we have a statistician among us (Jon C.?) or someone   
who wants to figure out whether five matches in   
our Typophile sample is normal, unusual, improbable, etc.   
   
thx. for the graph Jared. What app is that?

The test is skewed, because people are participating in a "waterfall"\* fashion: they're much more likely to chime in if they see a shared birthday.   
   
\* Feeble typographic connection made!   
   
hhp

_\> Yuukkk, your parents told you what day you were   
conceived? That's more than what I'd want my parents   
to tell me_ .   
   
Nooo silly! I just like to believe that. It just sounds   
better than plain ol' April 8th. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012181832im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
Actually, due to freak coincidences, my wife and I   
know exactly when we conceived our kids. But don't   
worry, we won't tell them.   
   
Hrant LOL

BTW Where the hell is that iCal? I can't seem to find   
a link anywhere.

Yves, go to [http://www.icalx.com/html/typophile/day.php?cal=Typophile](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012181832/http:/www.icalx.com/html/typophile/day.php?cal=Typophile) and click the link "Subscribe" on the right side.   
   
BJ, it's Illustrator's graph function, about mid-way down on the tool palette.

26 October   
   
\_ iCal is great. You can access it via Apple's iCal app (free with OS X) or you can just access the site.   
   
\_ Illustrator's graph function is the bomb.   
   
\_ Yves, just as long as you don't name your kids after the town(s) where they were conceived.
July 11, very Cancer, moon walker, 4 am.
It

\>\> bj, it's Illustrator's graph function, about mid-way down on the tool palette.   
   
ouch. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012181832im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
thousands of hours spent in an app. and I've never tried   
making a graph. I clicked on it a few times by accident...   
   
I need to go wash.

ad me to december 13th.   
   
hildebrant.

"Actually, due to freak coincidences, my wife and I   
know exactly when we conceived our kids. But don't   
worry, we won't tell them."   
   
hahaha, I think they'll be happy :-D   
   
Talking about April Fools - first due date for the upcoming   
addition to the Bruhn family was April 1, but now it's changed to April 3   
... we'll see what happens ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012181832im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
Congratulations Peter!

aaaah , so sweet ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012181832im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif) thanks!   
   
Take a peek the little fellow/fellowess   
 [http://www.bruhnfamily.com/bebis2\_ultraljud\_v13.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012181832/http:/www.bruhnfamily.com/bebis2_ultraljud_v13.jpg)   
   
I'll train all our kids hard to be typographers/typedesigners ;)
I just celebrated my birthday with a big group of type friends here in Vancouver at ATypI. One of the best birthdays I've ever had...

Happy belated birthday Tamye!   
   
As for me, I'm part of the majority representin' Aries in the hizouse!   
   
April 6th baby!   
   
:D

Congrats Tamye!   
And Peter too!   
   
hhp

_\> One of the best birthdays I've ever had..._   
   
I can imagine, you lucky girl! Have a good one Tamye! ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012181832im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
Today

Happy birthday!   
   
hhp
Happy birthday, Vincent! I'm raising a glass of Apricot Ale in your honor. (Actually I was raising it anyway, but now I have a reason.)
Happy birthday, Vincent!
July seems to be one of the slimmer months. Let help that litle month along by anouncing my B-day: july 10
June 25 - Cancer, horse

Funny that there aren't many june/july kids here... I remember when I was in school, the vast majority of the class had their birthdays in those months. For years I was the only april kid in my class.

I hated having a summer birthday as a kid. It seemed we were always on vacations and I never got to have a party with all my friends from church and school. Probably explains why I still enjoy celebrating it. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012181832im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif) HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO ME!

August 26, Virgo, Tiger   
   
Where's the calendar btw?
Check Jared's post of Wednesday, September 24th higher up in this thread, Karen.

Oops. it may seem like I never read. But the truth really is that I am quite blind.   
thanks Yves, again.
